item.title: Pinterest因裁员及转向人工智能战略后销售预期疲软股价下跌
item.description: Pinterest公司最新季度销售额预测低于华尔街预期，而就在几周前，该公司刚宣布裁员并转向人工智能产品领域。【原文：Pinterest Inc. projected current-quarter sales that fell short of Wall Street estimates, just weeks after announcing layoffs and a pivot toward artificial intelligence products.】

item.title: Waymo尝试寻找DoorDash司机来关闭自动驾驶出租车敞开的车门
item.description: 字母表公司旗下Waymo正招募亚特兰大DoorDash司机，负责关闭无人驾驶出租车未关好的车门，使这些无人驾驶车辆得以继续行驶。【原文：Alphabet Inc.’s Waymo is enlisting DoorDash Inc. drivers in Atlanta to close robotaxi doors that have been left open, letting the driverless vehicles continue on their way.】

item.title: IBM计划在美国将入门级职位招聘规模扩大三倍
item.description: 国际商业机器公司表示，尽管人工智能似乎正在抑制对初级员工的广泛需求，但该公司将在2026年将美国初级职位的招聘规模扩大三倍。【原文：International Business Machines Corp. said it will triple entry-level hiring in the US in 2026, even as artificial intelligence appears to be weighing on broader demand for early-career workers.】

item.title: 音乐产业步入"少即是多"时代
item.description: 随着每日有6万首完全由人工智能生成的曲目涌入流媒体平台，加上现有平台上超过2亿首歌曲，音乐产业正对这场冲击波日益警惕。【原文：With 60,000 wholly AI-generated tracks delivered to streaming services daily and upwards of 200 million songs on platforms, the music industry is growing wary of the onslaught】

item.title: 高盛牵头为清水收购案提供35亿美元私人贷款
item.description: 由高盛另类投资部门牵头的私募信贷机构集团正提供35亿美元资金，支持对清水分析控股公司的收购。这是直接贷款机构为软件收购提供资金的最新案例。【原文：A group of private credit firms led by Goldman Sachs Alternatives is providing $3.5 billion to support the buyout of Clearwater Analytics Holdings Inc., the latest instance of direct lenders funding software acquisitions.】

item.title: 房地产股因担忧人工智能对办公需求构成威胁而下跌
item.description: 周四，商业地产股价暴跌，交易员担忧人工智能工具使用率提升将冲击办公空间需求，由此加剧了周三始于市场小范围的抛售潮。【原文：Commercial real estate stocks nosedived Thursday as traders worried about risk to demand for office space from higher use of artificial intelligence tools, broadening a selloff that began Wednesday in small corner of the market.】

item.title: 蓝冠高级燃气交易员与分析师离职，油价剧烈震荡
item.description: 知情人士透露，随着市场价格剧烈波动削弱盈利能力，BlueCrest资本管理公司高级天然气交易员亚历克斯·沃森及数名分析师已离职。【原文：BlueCrest Capital Management’s senior natural gas trader Alex Watson and several analysts have left the firm as extreme price moves in markets dented profitability, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 奔富葡萄酒制造商为清醒世界制定转型计划
item.description: 萨姆·费舍尔作为天宝酒业的新任掌门人，正试图向受挫的投资者证明：少即是多。【原文：Sam Fischer, the new boss of Treasury Wine Estates Ltd., wants to convince bruised investors that less is more.】

item.title: Anthropic以3800亿美元估值完成300亿美元融资
item.description: Anthropic公司已完成一笔融资交易，以3800亿美元估值从投资者处筹集300亿美元资金（含本次融资额），此举将助力这家人工智能公司在与竞争对手OpenAI的较量中扩大优势。【原文：Anthropic has completed a deal to raise $30 billion in funding from investors at a $380 billion valuation, including the money raised, bolstering the artificial intelligence company as it gains ground on rival OpenAI.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉将向雪佛龙、雷普索尔授予更多石油钻探区块
item.description: 知情人士透露，随着特朗普政府推动私营企业重建委内瑞拉能源部门，该国计划向雪佛龙公司和西班牙雷普索尔公司授予更多石油开采用地。【原文：Venezuela plans to grant more oil-production land to Chevron Corp. and Spain’s Repsol SA as the Trump administration pushes for private companies to rebuild the nation’s energy sector, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 估值暴跌，交易延期，戳破美国IPO乐观情绪
item.description: 过去一周，美国IPO市场遭遇重挫，多家科技初创企业上市后股价暴跌，令蜂拥而入的投资者蒙受损失，这令市场对今年晚些时候即将上市的巨头企业所抱有的乐观情绪蒙上阴影。【原文：The US IPO market was jolted over the past week as companies going public delivered losses to investors that piled into technology upstarts, threatening the buoyant mood ahead of mega-listings expected later this year.】

item.title: 加拿大央行行长罗杰斯敦促中小企业投资人工智能
item.description: 加拿大央行副行长警告称，若人工智能投资集中于该国大型企业，未来将面临通胀风险。【原文：The Bank of Canada’s second-in-command is warning of future inflation risks if investment in artificial intelligence is concentrated among the country’s big companies.】

item.title: 美银称美联储与财政部协议对市场影响有限
item.description: 美国银行策略师指出，美联储主席提名人凯文·沃什呼吁与财政部达成新协议，不太可能实质性影响债券价格，因为这两个机构本就保持着密切合作。【原文：Federal Reserve chair nominee Kevin Warsh’s call for a new accord with the Treasury Department is unlikely to materially move bond prices as the two institutions already work closely together, according to strategists at Bank of America.】

item.title: 黑石任命前乐高家族财务经理为高级顾问
item.description: 黑石集团任命托马斯·施莱歇尔为北欧地区高级顾问，他曾为乐高集团亿万富翁所有者管理资金。【原文：Blackstone Inc. has named Thomas Schleicher, who used to manage money for the billionaire owners of Lego A/S, as a senior adviser for the Nordic region.】

item.title: 苹果Vision Pro设备发布两年后终于迎来YouTube应用
item.description: 谷歌母公司Alphabet旗下的YouTube于周四为苹果Vision Pro头显推出专用应用，在该设备问世两年后填补了其娱乐功能阵容中的显著空白。【原文：Alphabet Inc.’s YouTube released a dedicated app for Apple Inc.’s Vision Pro on Thursday, filling a notable gap in the headset’s lineup of entertainment options two years after its debut.】

item.title: 南非总统誓言重振经济增长，市场应声上涨
item.description: 南非总统西里尔·拉马福萨承诺将加快实施提振经济、吸引投资和提高政府效率的措施。若能落实，这一承诺将为当前火热的市场涨势注入新的动力。【原文：South African President Cyril Ramaphosa pledged to accelerate measures to fire up the economy, draw investment and make the government more efficient, an undertaking that will provide further impetus to a blistering markets rally if implemented.】

item.title: 波利市场向纽约市民免费发放食品，此前曼达尼曾进行嘲讽
item.description: 预测市场初创企业Polymarket于周四在曼哈顿西村开设了一家临时杂货店，免费派发食品和生活必需品。这场促销活动因物流问题而推迟。【原文：Prediction market startup Polymarket opened a temporary grocery store in Manhattan’s West Village on Thursday, giving away free food and household staples in a promotional campaign that was delayed by logistical issues.】

item.title: 因NBA操盘丑闻余波 PointsBet在安大略省将被暂停运营
item.description: 安大略省博彩监管机构已采取行动，暂时吊销PointsBet加拿大子公司的注册资格。此前这家在线体育博彩运营商被指控未上报与2024年操纵投注事件相关的可疑投注记录，该事件涉及多伦多猛龙队一名球员。【原文：Ontario’s gambling regulator moved to temporarily suspend the registration of PointsBet’s Canada subsidiary after the online sportsbook operator allegedly failed to report suspicious wagers related to a 2024 bet-rigging scheme involving a Toronto Raptors player.】

item.title: OpenAI推出首款采用英伟达竞争对手Cerebras芯片的模型
item.description: OpenAI正推出其首个基于半导体初创公司Cerebras Systems芯片运行的人工智能模型，这是ChatGPT开发商为拓展合作芯片制造商范围（除英伟达公司外）所采取的举措之一。【原文：OpenAI is releasing its first artificial intelligence model that runs on chips from semiconductor startup Cerebras Systems Inc., part of a push by the ChatGPT maker to broaden the pool of chipmakers it works with beyond Nvidia Corp.】

item.title: 私人信贷在SaaS末日来临前就已问题重重
item.description: 已经不是2021年了。【原文：It’s not 2021 anymore.】

item.title: 谷歌称DeepThink人工智能可协作处理高阶数学与科学问题
item.description: Alphabet公司表示，其已更新Gemini Deep Think人工智能模型，以提升该模型在数学和科学研究领域的表现。【原文：Alphabet Inc. has updated its Gemini Deep Think artificial intelligence model for better performance in math and science research, the company said.】

item.title: 燃料公司Arko Petroleum在2亿美元IPO后首日下跌1%
item.description: 阿科石油公司股票开盘价较首次公开募股价格下跌1.4%，此前这家燃料批发商在美国首次公开募股中筹集了2亿美元。【原文：Arko Petroleum Corp., shares opened 1.4% below their IPO price, after the fuel wholesaler raised $200 million in a US initial public offering.】

item.title: 大豆价格升至11月以来最高水平，中美谈判成为焦点
item.description: 大豆期货价格升至11月18日以来的最高水平，交易员们正密切关注美国总统特朗普与习近平主席会晤前，美国对华大豆供应可能进一步增加的潜在影响。【原文：Soybean futures reached the highest levels since Nov. 18 as traders eyed the potential for further sales of American supplies to China ahead a meeting between US President Donald Trump and his counterpart Xi Jinping.】

item.title: 谷歌因搜索广告定价问题遭欧盟反垄断调查
item.description: 谷歌因涉嫌在搜索引擎上非法操纵广告价格，正面临欧盟新一轮调查。此前欧盟已对其处以数十亿欧元的反垄断罚款。【原文：Google, the target for billions of euros in European Union antitrust fines, has been hit by a fresh EU probe over concerns it’s illegally rigging the cost of advertising on its search engine.】

item.title: 芝加哥将出售未缴费用产生的债务，尽管买家尚不确定
item.description: 芝加哥正计划出售约10亿美元债务，这些债务源于未缴停车罚单等欠款。与此同时，该市一位高级财政官员警告称，此次史无前例的债券发行预计成本高昂，且投资者需求尚不明朗。【原文：Chicago is seeking to sell about $1 billion in debt the city is owed from things like unpaid parking tickets even as a top finance official warns the unprecedented offering is expected to be costly with uncertain investor appetite.】

item.description:

item.title: 美国抵押贷款利率小幅下调，30年期贷款利率降至6.09%
item.description: 美国抵押贷款利率时隔一个月首次回落，住房可负担性正逐步改善。【原文：US mortgage rates fell for the first time in a month as housing affordability slowly improves.】

item.title: 比特币暴跌暴露布克莱的豪赌并冲击萨尔瓦多债务
item.description: 比特币暴跌对萨尔瓦多的冲击尤为剧烈，暴露了总统纳伊布·布克莱高风险拥抱加密货币的风险，并使该国债务市场剧烈震荡。【原文：Bitcoin’s crash has hit few places as hard as El Salvador, exposing the risks of President Nayib Bukele’s high-stakes embrace of crypto and whipsawing the country’s debt markets.】

item.title: 物流股暴跌，人工智能恐慌交易再添新牺牲品
item.description: 物流股周四暴跌，投资者因担忧人工智能引发的行业冲击而争相抛售该板块股票，使其成为"人工智能恐慌交易"的最新牺牲品。【原文：Logistics stocks sank Thursday as investors rushed to exit the group amid fears over disruption from artificial intelligence, making it the latest casualty of the “AI scare trade.”】

item.title: 政治因素渗入奥运会：乌克兰选手因头盔问题遭禁赛
item.description: 俯卧在平底雪橇上，准备头朝下俯冲冰道时，钢架雪车运动员弗拉迪斯拉夫·赫拉什凯维奇在冬奥会训练中始终戴着头盔——盔面印着乌克兰同胞的肖像，这些同胞在俄罗斯入侵祖国期间不幸遇难。【原文：Lying face-down on a flat sled, ready to lunge head-first down an ice track, skeleton athlete Vladyslav Heraskevych wore a helmet during his training sessions for the Winter Olympics featuring images of fellow Ukrainians who had died during Russia’s invasion of his country.】
